title: CO residence time modulates multi-carbon formation rates in a zero-gap Cu based CO2 electrolyzer
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02004A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Siddhartha Subramanian, Jesse Kok, Pratik Gholkar, Asvin Sajeev Kumar, Hugo-Pieter Iglesias van Montfort, Ruud Kortlever, Atsushi Urakawa, Bernard Dam, Thomas Burdyny
This study shows how flow field designs can be used to modulate CO concentrations and hydrocarbon production rates in a zero gap copper based carbon dioxide electrolyzer.
